item.title: Kristen add a quote by Joseph Campbell
item.description: "Life has no meaning. Each of us has meaning and we bring it to life. It is a waste to be asking the question when you are the answer." -- Joseph Campbell

item.title: Kristen add a quote by Joseph Campbell
item.description: "We must be willing to let go of the life we planned so as to have the life that is waiting for us." -- Joseph Campbell

item.title: Kristen add a quote by Joseph Campbell
item.description: "The cave you fear to enter holds the treasure you seek." -- Joseph Campbell

item.title: Kristen add a quote by Joseph Campbell
item.description: "The privilege of a lifetime is being who you are." -- Joseph Campbell

item.title: Kristen add a quote by Joseph Campbell
item.description: "Follow your bliss and the universe will open doors for you where there were only walls." -- Joseph Campbell

item.title: Kristen add a quote by Joseph Campbell
item.description: "People say that what we’re all seeking is a meaning for life. I don’t think that’s what we’re really seeking. I think that what we’re seeking is an experience of being alive, so that our life experiences on the purely physical plane will have resonances with our own innermost being and reality, so that we actually feel the rapture of being alive." -- Joseph Campbell

item.title: Kristen add a quote by Joseph Campbell
item.description: "Find a place inside where there's joy, and the joy will burn out the pain." -- Joseph Campbell

item.title: Kristen add a quote by Joseph Campbell
item.description: "If the path before you is clear, you're probably on someone else's." -- Joseph Campbell

item.title: Kristen add a quote by Joseph Campbell
item.description: "Myths are public dreams, dreams are private myths." -- Joseph Campbell

item.title: Kristen add a quote by Joseph Campbell
item.description: "The goal of life is to make your heartbeat match the beat of the universe to match your nature with Nature." -- Joseph Campbell
